Comfrt: Welcome to Comfrt! We're so excited to have you. Here's your exclusive 15% off code: WELCOME15

Click here to auto-apply your discount and shop our viral best-sellers: comfrt.attn.tv/aQgP7C0e_EAE

Save our contact to make sure we land directly in your messages.

Comfrt: Your soon-to-be obsession is just sitting there, waiting to be yours!

Comfrt: Embrace the NEW

Pick your 2026 mood: comfrt.attn.tv/a3gHQ4K06TpX

Comfrt: First look: Petal Pink Camo Collection

We're so excited to share this NEW standout pattern in 5 styles.

Enjoy first access: comfrt.attn.tv/aBLdARlQtdFQ
The item is not available
Comfrt: I'm sorry, I currently don't have the exact date of a possible restock. I recommend checking our website and social media frequently.
How is it a first access link if the item isn't available! ?

Comfrt: I completely understand your concern, and I'm sorry for any inconvenience. I will have to double-check that with my team to be sure. As soon as I hear back, I will send you a message right away!
I appreciate that. Thank you
Comfrt: My pleasure! Have a great day in the meantime.
You as well. Thank you
Comfrt: Thank you. I'll keep you posted!
I signed up my email to be notified when the item was back in stock in my size,Received the email that it was now available just now and it's out of stock still...
Comfrt: I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. It looks like the item may have sold out again very quickly after it became available.

escalate: We don't ESC for this client, use ESC shortcut
If cx ask how to get/redeem the discount for downloading the app use ESC shortcut
templates: For Limited edition items don't use restock temps, they will not be restocked
dos_and_donts: Don't share the duration of the sale/sale dates with customers!

conversation.message_text: BÉIS Travel: Welcome to BÉIS Travel! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

BÉIS Travel: Hey there, newbie! First time shopping with us? We've handpicked some essentials to get you started: https://beistravel.attn.tv/aHRsWsaYjfRG . 

Enjoy 20% OFF with code WELCOME5WlTOT 
beistravel.attn.tv/agOVd45jES3o .
BÉIS Travel: Bags designed to make your every day easier. Save our contact to make getting all of our latest updates easy.
Invalid 20% off code
BÉIS Travel: I'm so sorry to hear that! Could you send me a screenshot of the error message you're getting along with the items in your cart? I'll be more than happy to check this for you.
Thank you! I was really hoping to do the Olive one.  I just tried on multiple items to see and it still didn't work.

BÉIS Travel: Thank you for the screenshot! The code won't work on the olive color as it's already on sale, and we don't stack discounts. I, however, was able to apply it to the maple and you can check out using this link: https://beistravel.attn.tv/ajOC7xscT9PH
That's so kind of you!! Thank you.  I do think I'm going to have to do the olive, the color is what I'm drawn to... how long does the discount last?

BÉIS Travel: I appreciate your kind words! Regarding the discount, unfortunately, I don't have information as to how long it would last. I would recommend using it while it's available! 

Please let me know how I can assist you further today, I'm just a text away.

tone: Let the customer have the last word

conversation.message_text: Grandpa Gus: Welcome to Grandpa Gus! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Grandpa Gus: Hey this is Grace, how can I help you?
Please cancel the order  that is getting ready to ship I can't afford it
Hello

Grandpa Gus: I'm really sorry for the inconvenience. Because we begin processing your order as soon as it's submitted, we cannot change or cancel your order once it's submitted. If you no longer need our products after receiving them, you can begin the return process by emailing us at email@grandpagus.com and provide proof of purchase. To manage your subscription, please log in or register your customer account through this page: https://grandpagus.attn.tv/aNnDs-Sg2b2Q
Please put my money back in my accaccount

Grandpa Gus: I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience. I don't have access to issue refunds directly, and unfortunately, we cannot change or cancel an order once it's submitted. If you no longer need the products after receiving them, you can start the return process by emailing us at email@grandpagus.com and including your proof of purchase. Our team will guide you through the steps to have your refund processed as quickly as possible. I truly appreciate your patience and understanding while this gets resolved.

send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS
